def_cn: （防止汽车驶入私人领地或进入某段公路的）水泥隔离柱，短柱，护柱
def_en: Bollards are short thick concrete posts that are used to prevent cars from going on to someone's land or on to part of a road.

def_cn: （河岸或港口的）系船柱，系缆桩
def_en: Bollards are strong wooden or metal posts on the side of a river or harbour. Boats are tied to them.
